headline: Union Pacific Eyes Early Filing for Norfolk Southern Takeover
summary: The Class I railroad aims to submit its merger application to the STB by late November as industry rivals push back and the Trump administration signals support.

raw.headline: Union Pacific Eyes Early Filing for Norfolk Southern Takeover
raw.summary: The Class I railroad aims to submit its merger application to the STB by late November as industry rivals push back and the Trump administration signals support.

headline: Short line CEO joins STB rail advisory council
summary: The Surface Transportation Board has added another executive to its industry advisory council. The post Short line CEO joins STB rail advisory council appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: Norfolk Southern Q3 Earnings & Revenues Beat Estimates, Rise Y/Y
summary: NSC posts solid Q3 results with earnings and revenues topping estimates and surging year over year; merchandise strength offsetting coal weakness.

headline: Norfolk Southern (NSC) Q3 2025 Earnings Transcript
summary: Mark George: Hey, good afternoon, and thank you for joining us.  With me today are John Orr, our Chief Operating Officer, Ed Elkins, our Chief Commercial Officer, and Jason Zampi, our Chief Financial Officer.

raw.headline: Norfolk Southern (NSC) Q3 2025 Earnings Transcript
raw.summary: Mark George: Hey, good afternoon, and thank you for joining us.  With me today are John Orr, our Chief Operating Officer, Ed Elkins, our Chief Commercial Officer, and Jason Zampi, our Chief Financial Officer.

headline: NSC Q3 Deep Dive: Productivity Offsets Volume Headwinds Amid Merger Uncertainty
summary: Freight transportation company Norfolk Southern (NYSE:NSC) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q3 CY2025, with sales up 1.7% year on year to $3.10 billion. Its GAAP profit of $3.16 per share was 2.5% below analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.headline: NSC Q3 Deep Dive: Productivity Offsets Volume Headwinds Amid Merger Uncertainty

headline: Norfolk Southern: Hold For Now, But Watch For A Pullback
summary: Norfolk Southern (NSC) outperforms S&P 500; learn about its return outlook, key risks, and the impact of a possible Union Pacific deal.

headline: UP, NS say a merger will cut carload transit times. Shippers aren’t convinced.
summary: Carload trip duration and equipment utilization haven’t improved meaningfully despite several other mergers in the last few decades, one expert said.

headline: Union Pacific: A Transcontinental Titan For America's Industrial Revival
summary: Union Pacific Corporation is set to acquire Norfolk Southern, creating the first transcontinental railroad giant. Learn more about UNP stock here.
